item.title: Live updates: OpenAI exec plans $1 million donation to Trump inaugural committee
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.

item.title: Column: Trump may be moving GOP senators on Hegseth, but he’s not swaying Americans
Trump may be moving GOP senators on Hegseth, but he’s not swaying Americans
item.description: The president-elect’s embattled pick to run the Defense Department has seen his numbers slide over the past two weeks.

item.title: Vance invites Daniel Penny, acquitted in New York chokehold death, to Army-Navy game
Daniel Penny invited to join JD Vance at Army-Navy football game in Maryland
item.description: Penny, a former Marine, was asked to accompany President-elect Donald Trump in his suite at the game Saturday.
